message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not comfortable meeting you at $120. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $155. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not comfortable going down to $140. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $152.50. It's a compromise that still reflects the product's value, but also takes into account your budget constraints.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not comfortable going down to $145. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $149.50. It's a compromise that's still close to my original price, but takes into account your budget constraints.
